item.title: Ch1. INTRODUCTION
item.description: This chapter contains the following content: Eq. 1.90 Derivation

item.title: Equation derivation procedure for 1.90
item.description: Section 1.5.5, PRML In this note, I will show the derivation procedure of the equation of 1.90 step by step. Before we start, I have to claim that the version of the textbook I am reading is the 2006 version. The Eq. 1.90 is list on Page 47. From Page 46 we know, the expected loss can be written as \[\small \mathbb{E}[L] = \iint\{y(\mathbf{x}) - t\}^2 p(\mathbf{x}, t)\mathrm{d}\mathbf{x}\mathrm{d}t \]

item.title: Pattern Recognition and Machine Learning
item.description: This page contain the reading notes of Pattern Recognition and Machine Learning (PRML), 2006 Version E-book. It contains the following chapters: Introduction
